pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to the 'RESOURCECODE' Hindcast Database // Utility functions to download data from the 'RESOURCECODE' hindcast database of sea-states, time series of sea-state parameters and time series of 1D and 2D wave spectra. See https://resourcecode.ifremer.fr for more details about the available data. Also provides facilities to plot and analyse downloaded data, such as computing the sea-state parameters from both the 1D and 2D surface elevation variance spectral density.
